I know. I feel how youâ€™re unbalanced and lost from here. I do too.
There are not words or actions to change the past and my horribleness. All I know how to do is be there and be the best person and friend now. Until you tell me to go away, Iâ€™ll be with you. Iâ€™ll listen to you, give you my best thoughts and deepest love.
I give you all I have.
